ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think this is true either.  I wanted a Runed Circlet so I went and camped it.  I sat right on the stage waiting for him to spawn.  Killed on PH, surfed
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think this is true either. I wanted a Runed Circlet so I went and
camped it. I sat right on the stage waiting for him to spawn. Killed on
PH, surfed the net a bit on my second computer, and them the Preacher
spawned right in front of my with the RC and a Velishoul's Page (how
convenient!).

There has always been rumors of anti-camping code in EQ, but I don't know of
a single location in the game where it's been proven.

[22 Enchanter] Chiming (Erudite) ZONE: Work
On Druzzil Ro

> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> Rumor has it though in the preacher room if you walk on the stage it will
> cause the Preacher not to spawn, Is this true? He only spawned twice all
> day yesterday (and my group was very careful not to walk on the stage.
> heh). Any truth in this? :)
>
> Ezrae Dreamstealer
> Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
> Brell Serilis
